channel.title: End Game Win Scenarios PLEASE
channel.description:
There should be some kind of spreadsheet or something that explains each and every outcome of a match explaining who will win in X scenario at the end of the game etc.
Example: "If a Prince and a Assassin are in a 1v1 on the last Day, Game will end with Blue Dragon winning"
I have lost one too many games as NK/Evil roles because of my lack of understanding the "weight" each role/class has when if i killed the Prince or something that night, I could have won. I'm sure many other players agree with me on this point.

item.title: End Game Win Scenarios PLEASE
item.dc:creator: Krohdo
item.description:
If someone with a lot of experience playing the game wants to send me info on their games such as: who was left and who won for each game they played/remember, I can throw together a class Weight spreadsheet and Win Scenario/Conditions spreadsheet and get it put on the wiki. Or if someone else is already in progress with the idea, just let me know!
